TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Mark_Aguirre, title = Mark_Aguirre, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Aguirre} }

S.FORM: Mark Aguirre 10 bulad 12 demiad, 1959 a mihca, Mark Aguirre, miunduay. Mark Aguirre nalecuhan i Chicago, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, u adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Aguirre i 1981 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 1, namapili' tu nu Dallas Mavericks putiput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza.

Mark Agoirre 10 bolad 12 demiad, 1959 a mihca, Mark Agoirre, miondoay. Mark Agoirre nalecohan i Chicago, Illinois, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, o adidi'ay ayaway mimaliay. Mark Agoirre i 1981 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ko owac ato silsil 1, namapili' to no Dallas Mavericks potipot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza.
